channel.title: At home with jim and joy
channel.desc: Jim and Joy sit down with Matt Scalici, the first employee at EWTN. He shares stories about the early days at EWTN and speaks about his time with Mother Angelica.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Daily mass
channel.desc: The Holy Sacrifice of the Mass with the friars each day from the EWTN Chapel in Irondale, Alabama. LIVE Monday through Saturday at 8 am Eastern (Encore).

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Holy Rosary From Lourdes
channel.desc: Pilgrims from around the world gather and pray the Rosary from the Lourdes Grotto in France, site of the famous apparitions by the Blessed Virgin Mary in 1858.

channel.desc: Msgr. Eugene Morris gives a homily on hope in Christian life and Justin Fatica tells his story about finding purpose through faith by serving others over purs.

channel.name: EWTN UK

channel.desc: EWTN's Tom Peterson shares compelling faith journeys of atheists, converts, and reverts to Jesus and the Church.
